name: StalinGulag
description:
StalinGulag - is a city builder with survival elements. You are entrusted with the leadership of the camp system of the Soviet Union. Turn a frosty Siberian patch of land into a prosperous Gulag. Support it by goods like provisions, tools, clothes and medicines.

Take a role of KGB commissar and rule the camp as you wish. Just try to not get arrested.



☭Complete the tasks of the party in the campaign or create your own camp in the economic mode.

☭Build, mine, produce and sell resources.

☭Strengthen your camp. Thick walls and armed guards will be needed.

☭Keep your prisoners in good condition.

☭A large number of random events will force you to competently control your resources.
